description: Defines an immutable Note model class with properties for id, title, content, timestamps, and pin status, along with utility methods for copying, serialization to database map, and deserialization from database map.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: An immutable data class representing a note with properties for id, title, content, timestamps, and pin status, including methods for copying and database serialization.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a new instance of Note, optionally replacing specified fields.

methods.name: toDbMap
methods.description: Serializes the Note object to a Map suitable for database storage.

methods.name: fromDbMap
methods.description: Constructs a Note object from a Map retrieved from the database.
